column1: 212311,"Art Director (Film, Television or Stage)",,"Determine how best to represent a concept visually
column3: Provide creative leadership to ensure production has desired effect, mood or style
column7: Manage operations of artistic or entertainment departments or organisations
column9: Develop artistic or design concepts for decoration, exhibition, performance or commercial purposes
column13: Study scripts to determine project requirements
column19: Collaborate with others to prepare or perform artistic productions
column21: Determine technical requirements of productions or projects
